price: 19.Yalli korosuk iyyah: isin ni-Yallitte как axcuk aqbaduk sugteenim nummah wohul sin dirabbosseh isin digaala sinnik waassaanam maduddaanaay sin qokla mara mageytan, siinik isi nafsi yadlume num kaxxa digaala kaa tammoysenno akeeral.
arabic: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسۡتَطِيعُونَ صَرۡفٗا وَلَا نَصۡرٗاۚ وَمَن يَظۡلِم مِّنكُمۡ نُذِقۡهُ عَذَابٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faqad kadhabūkum bimā taqūlūna famā tastaṭīʿūna ṣarfan walā naṣran waman yaẓlim minkum nudhiq'hu ʿadhāban kabīran
